name: Buzz!: The Ultimate Music Quiz
overview: Buzz!: The Ultimate Music Quiz is a music quiz in a TV gameshow format, hosted by the eponymous Buzz. The game offers a variety of single player and multiplayer modes (up to 6 players on PSP, up to 8 on PS3), local or online. On PS3, the game supports PlayStation Move in addition to the regular Buzz! Buzzers.
